# THIS FILE HAS BEEN GENERATED BY THE BUILD CONFIGURATION SYSTEM - DO NOT EDIT

set(MINECPP_ENGINE_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})

add_executable(minecpp_engine)

# Public include headers
target_include_directories(minecpp_engine
  PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include
  PRIVATE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include/minecpp/engine
)

# Source subdirectory
add_subdirectory("src")

target_link_libraries(minecpp_engine
        LINK_PRIVATE
        minecpp_api
        minecpp_controller
        minecpp_engine_api
        minecpp_entity
        minecpp_utils
        minecpp_game
        minecpp_nbt
        minecpp_chat
        minecpp_format
        minecpp_network
        minecpp_repository
        minecpp_command
        minecpp_storage_api
        minecpp_stream
        minecpp_lexer
        yaml-cpp
        Boost::system
        spdlog::spdlog
        libmb
)

add_subdirectory("api")
